question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your Account Settings. Go to Settings > Subscription > Cancel Plan. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period. No refunds are provided for partial months.

question: Why was I charged twice this month?
answer: Double charges can occur if you upgraded your plan mid-cycle (you'll see a prorated charge for the upgrade) or if a previous payment failed and was retried. Check your billing history in Settings > Billing for details on each charge. If you believe this is an error, we can investigate and issue a refund if warranted.

question: How do I get a refund?
answer: We offer refunds within 14 days of purchase for annual plans, and within 7 days for monthly plans. To request a refund, go to Settings > Billing > Request Refund, or contact support with your account email and reason for the refund. Refunds are processed within 5-10 business days.

question: How do I update my payment method?
answer: To update your payment method: Go to Settings > Billing > Payment Methods. Click 'Add New Card' to add a new payment method, then set it as default. You can remove old payment methods after adding a new one.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover), debit cards, and PayPal. For annual enterprise plans, we also accept bank transfers and invoicing.

question: How do I download my invoice?
answer: All invoices are available in Settings > Billing > Invoice History. Click on any invoice to view or download it as a PDF. Invoices are also emailed to your account email after each successful payment.

question: Can I switch from monthly to annual billing?
answer: Yes! You can switch to annual billing at any time and save 20%. Go to Settings > Subscription > Change Plan. When you switch, you'll be charged the annual rate immediately, and any remaining credit from your monthly plan will be applied.

question: What happens if my payment fails?
answer: If a payment fails, we'll retry the charge 3 times over 7 days. You'll receive email notifications for each retry. If all retries fail, your account will be downgraded to the free tier. Update your payment method to restore access immediately.
